name: Kirby Cake Adventure
description:
Game created for the Bitsy Game Jam 2022 (sep 19-23) where we had to choose a known video game character and create a game around what would be an "everyday situation" like for that character. 

For our game we chose the character Kirby from Nintendo and a situation where a cat asks him to get the ingredient for a cake that he can find all around its castle

Team members:
Daniel Pinhão
Pedro Torres
Diogo Caetano
Eduardo Martins Azevedo
Rodrigo Pires
